Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows to compute the modulation function according to the piece-wise envelope shape by Jennings et al. (1968)

computeModulation(time, riseTime, levelTime, alpha, power) time = the time value for which the modulation function is computed riseTime = it is the instant of time (in sec) corresponding to the beginning of the horizontal part of the envelope levelTime = it is the instant of time corresponding to the beginning of the descending branch of the envelope. The Level Time should be larger than the Rise Time. alpha = a parameter influencing the envelope power = a power coefficient
